name: Sketch Fight (Kay Pacha)
description:
SIMPLIFIED MOBILE VERSION FOR WEB OF SKETCH FIGHT

Try to survive! Defend the heart from all enemies that approach. Live longer to get better rewards.

Get new weapons, each with different mechanics. Every time you defeat a boss, you will get a new treasure. And calm down that each type of weapon has a lot of different skins. (In the mobile version)

Will you have enough skill for this challenge? Try it for yourself!

CHARACTERISTICS
● Win treasures to unlock new aspects of your weapons. (In the mobile version)
● Build your strategy and choose the weapon that best suits you. (In the mobile version)
● Beat your own wave record.
● Go through different waves and defeat the bosses that are waiting for you.

Assistance
Do you have any problem? Write to: kaypacha.gamestudios@gmail.com
